## Industry

We offer a 3-months free FACTS Evaluation License to see firsthand the power and features of our FACTS simulation tool. Please [contact us](contact.qmd) to learn more about this offer or our regular licenses.

## Acadmia / Research Institutions

To academic and other research institutions, we will generally offer a free FACTS license under certain conditions. Please [contact us](contact.qmd) to see if your organizations qualifies.
